DBsheetConfig.query: SELECT T1.Id, T1.GroupingId, T1.SettlementDays, T5.value Calendar, T6.value Frequency, T7.value PaymentConvention, T8.value RuleName, T9.value DayCounter, T10.value SettlesAccrual, T11.value PaysAtDefaultTime FROM ORE.dbo.ConventionsCDS T1 LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesCalendar T5 ON T1.Calendar = T5.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesFrequencyType T6 ON T1.Frequency = T6.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesBusinessDayConvention T7 ON T1.PaymentConvention = T7.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesDateRule T8 ON T1.RuleName = T8.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesDayCounter T9 ON T1.DayCounter = T9.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesBool T10 ON T1.SettlesAccrual = T10.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesBool T11 ON T1.PaysAtDefaultTime = T11.value

field.name: *Calendar
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value Calendar, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesCalendar !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: *Frequency
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value Frequency, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesFrequencyType !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: *PaymentConvention
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value PaymentConvention,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesBusinessDayConvention !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: *RuleName
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value RuleName,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesDateRule !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: *DayCounter
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value DayCounter, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesDayCounter !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: *SettlesAccrual
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value SettlesAccrual,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesBool !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: *PaysAtDefaultTime
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value PaysAtDefaultTime,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesBool !T! ORDER BY value
